short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helper for searching / copying tags of Simple Icons.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Helper for searching / copying tags of Simple Icons.

Features:
- search simple icons
- copy simple icon tags to clipboard
- copy hex code of a logo color
- select a logo color for icons
